title: No Radio, No Power Meter, No Problem: Mishaps Can’t Foil Mathieu van der Poel at Paris-Roubaix
content:
Van der Poel flew blind to Hellish triple after cobblestone sparring match with Pogačar: 'It is exceptional what he does.'

Read the full article at No Radio, No Power Meter, No Problem: Mishaps Can’t Foil Mathieu van der Poel at Paris-Roubaix on Velo.
author: sstokes
